actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.

official_title: Resolution disapproving the proposed deferral of budget authority for the design of a metallurgy research center to be established on the Fort Douglas Military Reservation, Utah (deferral No.  D 76-110).

summary.text: Disapproves the proposed deferral of budget authority in the amount of $688,430 for the Secretary of the Interior to design a metallurgy research center to be established on the Fort Douglas Military Reservation, Utah (deferral number D76-110).

titles.title: Resolution disapproving the proposed deferral of budget authority for the design of a metallurgy research center to be established on the Fort Douglas Military Reservation, Utah (deferral No.  D 76-110).
